mapper.insert: insert into KSWSJB (ID, GZZM, SCSJ, SKSW, RKLL, CKLL) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gzzm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sksw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rkll,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ckll,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update KSWSJB set GZZM = #{gzzm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SKSW = #{sksw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RKLL = #{rkll,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CKLL = #{ckll,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select ID, GZZM, SCSJ, SKSW, RKLL, CKLL from KSWSJB
